trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for parts stored in a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供基底類別的組件儲存在<xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This class is abstract.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別是抽象的。

trans-unit.source: A PackagePart consists of three basic elements: |Access|Description| |------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A>|The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the part.| |<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.ContentType%2A>|The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type of the content stream.| |<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStream%2A>|The content data stream of the part.|
trans-unit.target: PackagePart 包含三個基本元素: |存取 |描述 | |------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A>|[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]組件。 | |<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.ContentType%2A>|[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)]內容資料流的類型。 | |<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStream%2A>|組件的內容資料流 |</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStream%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.ContentType%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> class with a specified parent <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Package*> and part [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref>具有指定的父類別<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Package*>和部分[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Package*>

trans-unit.source: `partUri` must be valid <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification and the [Open Packaging Conventions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255) specification.
trans-unit.target: `partUri`必須是有效的<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]形成根據[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *統一資源識別元 (URI) 的一般語法*規格和[開放式封裝慣例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)規格。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor when the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.ContentType%2A> of the part is not immediately known and will be set later when <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreatePart%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式時<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.ContentType%2A>組件不立即知道，且將稍後當<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreatePart%2A>稱為。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreatePart%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.ContentType%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CompressionOption%2A> property of the part is initialized to <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CompressionOption>.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CompressionOption%2A>組件的屬性會初始化為<xref:System.IO.Packaging.CompressionOption>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.CompressionOption> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CompressionOption%2A>

trans-unit.source: The parent <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> of the part.
trans-unit.target: 父代<xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>組件。

trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]組件，相對於父系<xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>根。

trans-unit.source: `partUri` must be valid <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification and the [Open Packaging Conventions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255) specification.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CompressionOption%2A> property of the part is initialized to <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CompressionOption>.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CompressionOption%2A>組件的屬性會初始化為<xref:System.IO.Packaging.CompressionOption>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.CompressionOption> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CompressionOption%2A>

trans-unit.source: `contentType` must be a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type formed in accordance with the [RFC 2616](http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html) *Hypertext Transfer Protocol - HTTP*, Section 3.7.
trans-unit.target: `contentType`必須是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)]按照所使用的型別形成[RFC 2616](http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html) *超文字傳輸通訊協定為 HTTP*，3.7 > 一節。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows an example of the content [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] types used in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] documents.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的內容範例[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)]中使用的類型[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文件。

trans-unit.source: |Description|Content Type| |-----------------|------------------| |Font|application/vnd.ms-opentype| |ICC profile|application/vnd.ms-color.iccprofile| |JPEG image|image/jpeg| |Obfuscated font|application/vnd.ms-package.obfuscated-opentype| |PNG image|image/png| |PrintTicket|application/vnd.ms-printing.printticket+xml| |TIFF image|image/tiff| |Windows Media Photo image|image/vnd.ms-photo|
trans-unit.target: |描述 |內容類型 | |-----------------|------------------| |字型 | 應用程式/vnd.ms-opentype | |ICC profile|application/vnd.ms-color.iccprofile| |JPEG 影像 | image/jpeg | |模糊化的 font|application/vnd.ms-package.obfuscated-opentype| |PNG 影像 | image/png | |PrintTicket|application/vnd.ms-printing.printticket+xml| |TIFF 影像 | 影像/tiff | |Windows 媒體相片影像 | 影像/vnd.ms 相片 |

trans-unit.source: CompressionOption is a read-only property that can be accessed only when the parent <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> is open.
trans-unit.target: CompressionOption 是唯讀的屬性可以存取，只有當父<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>已開啟。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: The CompressionOption property is automatically set by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 由自動設定 CompressionOption 屬性<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: After it is set by the constructor, the CompressionOption cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: 設定建構函式之後，就無法變更 CompressionOption。

trans-unit.target: -或- <> </> *> 未開啟 (<>*> 或<> *> 已呼叫)。 -衍生的類別所傳回的字串<> *> 方法是空的。

trans-unit.source: Creates a part-level relationship between this <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> to a specified target <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> or external resource.
trans-unit.target: 建立組件層級之間的關聯性這<xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref>到指定目標<xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref>或外部的資源。

trans-unit.source: A part-level relationship defines an association between this part and a target part or resource.
trans-unit.target: 組件層級關聯性定義這個組件的目標組件或資源之間的關聯。

trans-unit.source: A part-level relationship can be one of two forms.
trans-unit.target: 組件層級關聯性可以有兩種形式。

trans-unit.source: - Between a source <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> to a target <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> inside the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.
trans-unit.target: -之間來源<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>到目標<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart><xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>內</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart></xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>

trans-unit.source: - Between a source <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> to a target resource outside the package.
trans-unit.target: -之間來源<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>於封裝之外的目標資源。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>

trans-unit.source: In a part-relationship the source part is considered the "owner" of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 在組件關聯性來源組件會被視為 「 擁有者 」 的關聯性。

trans-unit.source: When the source part is deleted, all the relationships owned by the part are also deleted.
trans-unit.target: 刪除來源組件時，會一併刪除的部分所擁有的所有關聯性。

trans-unit.source: The process of creating or deleting the relationship does not physically alter the target part or resource in any way.
trans-unit.target: 建立或刪除的關聯性的程序不會實際變更的目標組件或以任何方式的資源。

trans-unit.source: The CreateRelationship method does not physically change either the source part, or the target part or resource in any way.
trans-unit.target: CreateRelationship 方法不會實際變更來源組件，或目標組件或以任何方式的資源。

trans-unit.source: The target of a relationship cannot be another relationship.
trans-unit.target: 關聯性的目標不能是另一個關聯性。

trans-unit.source: If `targetMode` is specified as <xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode>, `targetUri` must be a relative URI that is formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification.
trans-unit.target: 如果`targetMode`指定為<xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode>，`targetUri`必須是相對 URI，按照所使用的正確[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *統一資源識別元 (URI) 的一般語法*規格。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode>

trans-unit.source: The internal relative URI can be either an absolute path that starts with a forward slash ("/") character such as "/page1.xaml" or "/images/picture4.jpg", or a relative path such as "../imagespicture1.jpg" that resolves against the package root ("/") as the base URI.
trans-unit.target: 內部的相對 URI 可以是絕對路徑，開頭為斜線 （"/"） 字元例如"/ page1.xaml"或"/ images/picture4.jpg"，或相對路徑，例如 「.../ imagespicture1.jpg"解析針對封裝根目錄 （"/"） 做為基底 URI。

trans-unit.source: If `targetMode` is specified as <xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode>, `targetUri` can be either an absolute or relative URI formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification.
trans-unit.target: 如果`targetMode`指定為<xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode>，`targetUri`可以是任一個絕對或相對 URI 格式根據[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *統一資源識別元 (URI) 的一般語法*規格。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode>

trans-unit.source: "http://www.microsoft.com/page2.xml" is an example of an absolute URI that references an external target resource "page2.xml".
trans-unit.target: 「 http://www.microsoft.com/page2.xml 」 是絕對 URI 參照外部的目標資源 」 page2.xml 」 的範例。

trans-unit.source: "images/picture1.jpg" is an example of a relative URI that also references an external target resource "1.jpg" but which resolves against the URI of the package itself.
trans-unit.target: 「 images/picture1.jpg"是相對 URI，也會參考外部的目標資源 」&1;.jpg"但可解析針對封裝本身的 URI 的範例。

trans-unit.source: `relationshipType` must be a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that is formed according to the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification.
trans-unit.target: `relationshipType`必須是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]，形成根據[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *統一資源識別元 (URI) 的一般語法*規格。

trans-unit.target: 不同的封裝類型可以定義不同的組件層級關聯性類型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a part-level relationship between this <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> to a specified target <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> or external resource.
trans-unit.target: 建立組件層級之間的關聯性這<xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref>到指定目標<xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref>或外部的資源。

trans-unit.source: A part-level relationship defines an association between this part and a target part or resource.
trans-unit.target: 組件層級關聯性定義這個組件的目標組件或資源之間的關聯。

trans-unit.source: A part-level relationship can be one of two forms.
trans-unit.target: 組件層級關聯性可以有兩種形式。

trans-unit.source: - Between a source <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> to a target <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> inside the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.
trans-unit.target: -之間來源<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>到目標<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart><xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>內</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart></xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>

trans-unit.source: - Between a source <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> to a target resource outside the package.
trans-unit.target: -之間來源<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>於封裝之外的目標資源。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>

trans-unit.source: In a part-relationship the source part is considered the "owner" of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 在組件關聯性來源組件會被視為 「 擁有者 」 的關聯性。

trans-unit.source: When the source part is deleted, all the relationships owned by the part are also deleted.
trans-unit.target: 刪除來源組件時，會一併刪除的部分所擁有的所有關聯性。

trans-unit.source: The process of creating or deleting the relationship does not physically alter the target part or resource in any way.
trans-unit.target: 建立或刪除的關聯性的程序不會實際變更的目標組件或以任何方式的資源。

trans-unit.source: `id` must be a valid XML identifier.
trans-unit.target: `id`必須是有效的 XML 識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The `id` type is xsd:ID and must follow the naming conventions prescribed in the *XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes* specification (see [http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID](http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/)).
trans-unit.target: `id`型別是 xsd:ID，且必須遵照中規定的命名慣例*XML 結構描述第 2 部分︰ 資料型別*規格 (請參閱[http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID](http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/))。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method only in derived types where the value for the content type cannot be provided at the time of construction, or if calculating the content type value is a nontrivial or costly operation.
